name: Roll (akylol444)
description:
This is a ball game ive been working on, I hope you like it and it has taken me ages to make. It would help alot if you can donate because it would help me make the game much better.

If you find and bugs and problems, just tell me and ill try my best to fix it. I will try to keep updating the game and adding new levels. The full version will be coming out later on when I think the game is ready.

Controls

Left Arrow or A = Roll Left

Right Arrow or D = Roll Right

Space = Jump

Esc = Pause Game
